alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:55PM CDT until April 18 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek At Laurel. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 14.0 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 10.2 Thu 8 pm CDT 10.8 12.2 14.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
